import statsmodels.api as sm
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# set sample size
n = 100

# simulate model
x = np.random.normal(0, 1, n)
y = 10 + 5*x + np.random.normal(0, 1, n)

# add a constant to covariates
X   = sm.add_constant(x)

# fit ols model
ols = sm.OLS(y, X)
ols_fit = ols.fit()

# create predicted values
yhat = ols_fit.predict()
